number_of_code: Number of code announcements from control room
child_announce: Was the description of the child included in the announcement?
code_pink_team: Was the Code Pink team activated?
security_guard: Were sufficient security guards positioned at all entry/exit points within the hospital building?
counseling_to_mother: Was counseling provided to the mother?
searched: Were all areas, including exteriors, terrace, and basement, searched?
suspicious: Were suspicious persons within the hospital premises checked?
cctv: Were all areas closely examined through CCTV?
events: Were all events described to the mother?
emergency: Was the crash cart or emergency kit available?
compressions: Were compressions given as per standard?
shift_ccu: Was the patient shifted to the CCU?
medical: Was the medical team available in the CCU?
adequate: Was the CCU ready to receive the patient with adequate life support measures?
repetition: Was there a repetition of deviated areas?
debriefed: Were all events of Code Blue debriefed?
situation: Have they tried to assess the situation?
fire: Is there availability of fire fighting equipment?
demonstrated: Have they demonstrated the use of fire fighting equipment?
safety: Has the patient safety officer announced evacuation?
transportation: Are transportation modes available for evacuation?
assembly_point: Have they cleared the assembly point?
follow_up: Has the patient safety officer and team revisited the spot for follow-up?
debrief: Have all events of Code Red been debriefed?
debrief_p: Have all events of Code Pink been debriefed?
happythankyoumessage: Thank you for taking your time out to provide your valuable inputs.
unhappythankyoumessage: Thank you for taking your time out to provide your valuable inputs.
